plot outline: Yuvasamrat a youthful entertainer starring Kiran Nandakumar and Snizhana in the lead with Dr. Bharathi Vishnuvardhana in a special role.Yuvasamrat it is not just a love story, along with that it is a story of social responsibility. The movie revolves around the hero Kiran who is a straightforward, brave and a bold young man who is on a mission to find and finish the people who disturb the peace in the society. Along this journey, Kiran meets the beautiful, kind and caring Anu. The movie is all about how the Yuva Samrat wins people's heart.
title: Yuva Samrat
plot: Yuvasamrat a youthful entertainer starring Kiran Nandakumar and Snizhana in the lead with Dr. Bharathi Vishnuvardhana in a special role.Yuvasamrat it is not just a love story, along with that it is a story of social responsibility. The movie revolves around the hero Kiran who is a straightforward, brave and a bold young man who is on a mission to find and finish the people who disturb the peace in the society. Along this journey, Kiran meets the beautiful, kind and caring Anu. The movie is all about how the _Yuva Samrat_ (qv) wins people's heart.
